text: @SecPompeo @DeptofDefense @realDonaldTrump Fucking Pompeo is the icing on the cake! Trump borrowed to pay for his great economy 3.4 trillion borrowed. COVID-19 CDC knew on Jan 7 about need for tests. Trump knew but did nothing for 70 days. Trump walked away. 40% unemployment. War with China. Total incompetence.
